description:
Cozy 1Br Apt accommodates up to 4 people.
Includes 4 twin size beds, fully stocked kitchen and bath.
Only 5 minutes to the 7 train, 15 minutes to Times Square and downtown Manhattan.
My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).
name: Cozy 1Br Apartment. Entire Place
review: The place is great! Easy access to the line 7 metro and a 15-20 minute ride into Manhattan. We had 4 adults, and although it was a little tight, it was the perfect place just to come back to after being in the city. Great neighborhood with lots of character too!
